alert.note: Alert for Dane; Dodge; Jefferson; Rock; Walworth; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 4:18AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Walworth, northeastern Rock, northwestern Waukesha, east central Dane, Jefferson and southwestern Dodge Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 418 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Atkinson, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Whitewater, Pewaukee, Fort Atkinson, Hartland, Jefferson, Delafield, Lake Mills, Waterloo, Okauchee Lake, Oconomowoc, Merton, Johnson Creek, Deerfield, Dousman, Cambridge, Lac La Belle, Lake Ripley, Lake Koshkonong, and Ixonia. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 151 near mile marker 125. Interstate 39/90 between mile markers 154 and 155. Interstate 94 between mile markers 253 and 287. Wisconsin Highway 26 between mile markers 15 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dane; Dodge; Jefferson; Rock; Walworth; Waukesha
